description: Grafana home page of the transcode.eth dashboards.

options.content: ## Transcode.eth **Transcode.eth**, aka **Transcode.ninja**, operates with ninja-like agility‚Äîswift, agile, and precise in every transcoding task. Fueled by a 1 Gbps down and high-uptime internet connection near Frankfurt and London nodes, our services offer high performance, low latency, and unwavering reliability. ü•∑ ## Key Features - **Low Latency:** Real-time transcoding for broadcasters and viewers. - **High Performance:** With the capacity to scale directly to three NVIDIA 1070 cards or higher, Transcode.eth ensures consistent excellence in meeting demand. - **Transparency:** Operations, tools, and metrics proudly shared on [Transcode.ninja](https://transcode.ninja). - **High Uptimes:** Ensuring stability with robust internet and strategic positioning. ## Value Proposition ### For Delegators: - **Transparent Operations:** Track performance via public dashboards for trust and transparency. - **Stable Returns:** High-performance transcoding, strategic location, and high uptimes contribute to reliable returns. ### For Broadcasters: - **Low Latency:** Real-time transcoding for a smooth streaming experience. - **High-Quality Output:** Consistently delivers superior transcoded videos. - **Reliability:** High uptimes and strategic positioning provide a reliable transcoding solution. ## Get Involved Explore Transcode.eth's power by delegating your Livepeer tokens. - [ Delegate Now: Delegate to Transcode.eth](https://explorer.livepeer.org/accounts/0x5bdeedca9c6346b0ce6b17ffa8227a4dace37039/orchestrating) ## Contact Us For inquiries, feedback, or collaboration opportunities: - **Discord:** [rickstaa](https://discordapp.com/users/700320643962634300) Thanks for choosing Transcode.eth‚Äîwhere speed, agility, and strategic connectivity redefine video transcoding on Livepeer!

In our pursuit of transparency, we openly share orchestrator insights through public dashboards hosted on [GitHub](https://github.com/rickstaa/livepeer-setup). Delegators, share your ideas or requests [here](https://github.com/rickstaa/livepeer-setup/issues/new). **Dashboards Overview:** 1. Orchestrator Overview: Explore performance scores, active sessions, rewards, and more. 2. Orchestrator Payments Overview: Delve into payment insights, including the total ETH distributed to delegators, ETH payouts to the orchestrator, and the associated energy costs in generating income.

At Transcode.eth, an open-source ethos is central to our philosophy. We share tools for transparency and collaboration:

- **[livepeer-exporter](https://github.com/rickstaa/livepeer-exporter):** A Prometheus exporter for Livepeer orchestrator metrics, seamlessly integrating with diverse Livepeer endpoints. Explore its capabilities on our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/rickstaa/livepeer-exporter) and foster an open and collaborative ecosystem.

Certainly! Here's the updated roadmap with the additional step:

1. ‚úÖ **Setup Orchestrator and Conduct Initial Performance Tests**
   - Orchestrator successfully set up and underwent initial performance tests on the Livepeer network.

2. ‚úÖ **Create Grafana Dashboards**
   - Implemented Grafana dashboards for full operational transparency.

3. ‚úÖ **Develop Livepeer Prometheus Exporter**
   - Developed a Livepeer Prometheus exporter and shared it with the community, boosting the performance of orchestrator dashboards.

4. ‚è≥ **Conduct Rigorous Performance and Income Tests**
   - Perform extensive performance and income tests on the network with the new setup to ensure optimal functionality.

5. üöß **Brand Creation, Website Development, and Community Engagement**
   - Establish branding identity for Transcode.eth.
   - Develop a website to showcase services, features, and community engagement.
   - Create a Discord server for community interaction.
   - Set up official social media accounts for Transcode.eth to engage with the community.

6. üöß **Implement Delegator Voting Mechanism**
   - Introduce a mechanism for delegators to participate in voting processes.

7. üöß **Additional Delegator Reward Mechanism**
   - Explore and implement additional reward mechanisms for delegators, such as NFTs or voting tokens.

8. üöß **Evaluate Demand for Private Pool and Multi-Orchestrator Setup**
   - Assess demand for a private pool and consider transitioning to a multi-orchestrator setup if warranted.

Feel free to share any further thoughts or adjustments!

title: Home
